Čim vam se ukaže prelep pogled na donji Srem, znaćete da ste na pravom mestu. Tu su još i letnjikovac, klupice i stolovi, kao i omanje igralište za decu, pa je izletište idealno za odmor i porodična okupljanja.

Na Širokim ledinama je 1942. godine stradao narodni heroj Boško Palkovljević Pinki, čije se spomen-obeležje nalazi nedaleko od izletišta.

appMap.description_en: This spring source is located not that far from the main road that goes through the village, near the Roman Catholic church in the same-named street.
appMap.description_rs: Ovaj izvor se nalazi nedaleko od glavnog puta koji prolazi kroz selo, u blizini Rimokatoličke crkve u istoimenoj ulici.
appMap.description_long_en: This spring source is located not that far from the main road that goes through the village, near the Roman Catholic church in the same-named street. They say that this and “The Other Spring” come from the time of the Roman empire. It’s neat and tidy, and the water flows from 4 fountains. The main spring is located about 1000 metres further.
appMap.description_long_rs: Ovaj izvor se nalazi nedaleko od glavnog puta koji prolazi kroz selo, u blizini Rimokatoličke crkve u istoimenoj ulici. Za ovaj i Drugi izvor kažu da potiču iz vremena Rimskog carstva. Uređen je i voda teče iz četiri slavine. Glavno izvorište nalazi se 1000 metara dalje.

appMap.description_en: There are remnants of an medieval church in Ledinci, at the small plateau on the slopes of the hill, where today’s weekend-village Klisa is.
appMap.description_rs: U Ledincima, na maloj zaravni na obroncima brda, u današnjem vikend-naselju Klisa, nalaze se ostaci srednjovekovne crkve.
appMap.description_long_en: There are remnants of an medieval church in Ledinci, at the small plateau on the slopes of the hill, where today’s weekend-village Klisa is. Little is known about it. It’s called the St. George’s Church, and its colloquial name is the Tower of Ledinci, named after the tall bell tower that can be seen from the bottom of the hill. Story has it that that’s where the Savinac monastery used to be, which was dedicated to St. Sava, but it was lost after the turkish conquest. Is the Tower of Ledinci actually the Savinac monastery, or the Church of St. Prokopije, it cannot be confirmed based on just the historic scriptures.
appMap.description_long_rs: U Ledincima, na maloj zaravni na obroncima brda, u današnjem vikend-naselju Klisa, nalaze se ostaci srednjovekovne pravoslavne crkve o kojoj se malo toga zna. Zovu je Crkva Svetog Đorđa, a kolokvijalni naziv joj je Ledinačka kula, po visokom zvoniku koji se može videti iz podnožja brda. Priča se da se na tom mestu nekada nalazio manastir Savinac, posvećen Svetom Savi, kojem se nakon turskih osvajanja gubi svaki istoriografski trag. Da li je Ledinačka kula zapravo crkva manastira Savinac ili Crkva Svetog Prokopija, ne može se sa sigurnošću utvrditi iz istorijskih spisa.

appMap.description_en: This spring site is located deep in the woods unter a large oak tree, and sits right next to the bridge it got its name from.
appMap.description_rs: Ovaj izvor je smešten duboko u šumi pod velikim hrastom, a odmah uz ćupriju po kojoj je i dobio ime.
appMap.description_long_en: This spring site is located deep in the woods unter a large oak tree, and sits right next to the bridge it got its name from. Locals say that this place used to be teeming with life, but now only a handful of enthusiasts come by.
appMap.description_long_rs: Ovaj izvor je smešten duboko u šumi pod velikim hrastom, a odmah uz drvenu ćupriju po kojoj je i dobio ime. Meštani kažu da je ovo mesto ranije vrvelo od života, a sad navrati tek po koji entuzijasta.

appMap.description_en: The Kuluštra of this lookout (a former Roman fortification), provides a spectacular view of the Danube and its six islands, Bačka Palanka and Ilok.
appMap.description_rs: Sa Vidikovca, tj. Kuluštre, nekadašnjeg rimskog utvrđenja, pruža se pogled na Dunav i njegovih šest ostrva, Bačku Palanku i Ilok.
appMap.description_long_en:
The Kuluštra of this lookout (a former Roman fortification), provides a spectacular view of the Danube and its six islands, Bačka Palanka and Ilok.

The Romans once chose this land for their fortification Kuluštra, for a reason. The charms of the Danube and Fruška Gora has been enjoyed from here for over 15 centuries. Danube’s islands (Zeleni Sprud, Govneš, the Great Island, Neštin island and others) are a popular destination for fishermen and boaters.
appMap.description_long_rs:
Sa Vidikovca, tj. Kuluštre, nekadašnjeg rimskog utvrđenja, pruža se pogled na Dunav i njegovih šest ostrva, Bačku Palanku i Ilok.

Rimljani su nekada davno izabrali ovo mesto za svoje utvđenje Kuluštre, sa razlogom. Više od 15 vekova ljudi na ovom mestu uživaju u svim blagodetima Dunava i Fruške gore. Dunavske ade (Zeleni Sprud, Govneš, Veliku adu, Neštinsku adu i dr.) posebno vole da obilaze nautičari i ribolovci.

appMap.description_en: This beautiful, spacious meadow is located in a forest near the main road. It belongs to Villa Ravne.
appMap.description_rs: U šumi nedaleko od glavnog puta nalazi se prelepa prostrana livada koja je u sklopu poseda vile Ravne.
appMap.description_long_en: This beautiful, spacious meadow is located in a forest near the main road. It belongs to Villa Ravne. It is used by the National Park to reintroduce the European deer, so you can also find feeders for them along the meadow. Chances of spotting a deer in this part of Fruška Gora is very high.
appMap.description_long_rs: U šumi nedaleko od glavnog puta nalazi se prelepa prostrana livada koja je u sklopu poseda vile Ravne. Nju koristi Nacionalni park za reintrodukciju evropskog jelena, pa su tako na livadi poređane i hranilice za ovu divljač. Vrlo je verovatno da ćete ih ugledati u ovom delu Fruške gore.

appMap.description_en: The Neven spring is located near Rakovac. You can get to it by taking an easy stroll from Stari Ledinci over Kesten.
appMap.description_rs: Izvor Neven se nalazi nedaleko od Rakovca. Do njega možete stići laganom šetnjom iz Starih Ledinaca preko potesa Kesten.
appMap.description_long_en: The Neven spring is located near Rakovac. You can get to it by taking an easy stroll from Stari Ledinci over Kesten. Mountaineers and visitors of Fruška Gora like to quench their thirst and replenish at this spring. Many nature lovers expressed their gratitude towards this spring, so it was remade in 2011.
appMap.description_long_rs: Izvor Neven se nalazi nedaleko od  Rakovca i do njega možete stići laganom šetnjom iz Starih ledinaca preko potesa Kesten. Planinari i posetioci Fruške gore vole da utole svoju žeđ i okrepe se na ovom izvoru. Svoju naklonost prema ovom izvoru su izrazili mnogi ljubitelji prirode, te je izvor renoviran 2011. godine.

appMap.description_en: This spring holds true to its name, the Valley of Peace - the area around it is absolutely serene.
appMap.description_rs: Izvor u potpunosti opravdava svoj naziv, jer čitav potes do njega pleni mirnoćom.
appMap.description_long_en: This spring holds true to its name, the Valley of Peace - the area around it is absolutely serene. You can reach it via an asphalt road, which ends up at Villa Ravne.
appMap.description_long_rs: Izvor u potpunosti opravdava svoj naziv, jer čitav potes do njega pleni mirnoćom. Do izvora se stiže asfaltnim putem koji dalje vodi sve do vile Ravne.

appMap.description_en: This meadow is situated in the forest near Sviloš, and it is a fenced enclosure for deer to graze in.
appMap.description_rs: Ova livada je smeštena je u šumi nedaleko od Sviloša i predstavlja ograđen i uređen prostor za ispašu jelena.
appMap.description_long_en: This meadow is situated in the forest near Sviloš, and it is a fenced enclosure for deer to graze in. You can enjoy clean and fresh air here, listening to the gentle sounds of nature.
appMap.description_long_rs: Ova livada je smeštena je u šumi nedaleko od Sviloša i predstavlja ograđen i uređen prostor za ispašu jelena. Ovde možete uživati u čistom i svežem vazduhu uz mile zvukove prirode.

appMap.description_en: This spring is located at the end of the village of Neštin, and it is special due to its orderliness.
appMap.description_rs: Ovaj izvor se nalazi na obodu sela Neštin i poseban je po svojoj uređenosti.
appMap.description_long_en: This spring is located at the end of the village of Neštin, and it is special due to its orderliness. The garden around the spring resembles a Japanese garden, thanks to the efforts of Mr Pavle, who often comes by to maintain it.
appMap.description_long_rs: Ovaj izvor se nalazi na obodu sela Neštin i poseban je po svojoj uređenosti. Vrt oko izvora sličan japanskom nastao je zahvaljujući trudu čika Pavla, koji ga obilazi i održava.

appMap.description_en: This unique part of cultural heritage was built by monks from the Rakovac monastery in the 18th century.
appMap.description_rs: Ovaj jedinstveni deo kulturnog nasleđa sаgrаdili su mоnаsi iz Rаkоvаčkоg mаnаstirа u XVIII veku.
appMap.description_long_en: Gorgeous views adorn the road towards this heritage site. This interesting signpost is carved into the soft limestone that’s surrounded by thick forest with short growth. It’s exactly this difficult approach and physical distance from the village that made it safe, and so it’s mostly still in its original state. This is the only anchoress in Vojvodina, and represents a protected cultural heritage monument. It was built by monks in the Rakovac monastery in the 18th century. It’s known to have been visited often by many from the church’s highest ranks, which gives it a remarkable historic and cultural value.
appMap.description_long_rs: Predivni pejzaži se pružaju na putu ka ovom kulturnom dobru. Ova vеоmа zаnimlјiva isposnica uklеsаnа је u mеku krеčnjаčku stеnu kоја је оkružеnа gustоm šumоm sа niskim rаstinjеm. Upravo taj otežan pristup i fizička udаlјеnоst оd nаsеlја učinili su dа sе ona оčuvа u skоrо izvоrnоm stаnju. Ovo je jеdinа ispоsnicа u Vојvоdini i predstavlja zаštićеni spоmеnik kulturе. Sаgrаdili su је mоnаsi iz Rаkоvаčkоg mаnаstirа u XVIII veku. Pоznаtо је dа su је pоsеćivаli mnоgi crkvеni vеlikоdоstојnici, štо јој dаје izuzеtnu kulturno-istorijsku vrеdnоst.

appMap.description_en: Vezirac Hill sits at the foot of Fruška gora, between Sremski Karlovci and Petrovaradin. It is best known as the location of the memorial to the Battle.
appMap.description_rs: Brdo Vezirac se nalazi pri podnožju Fruške gore, između Sremskih Karlovaca i Petrovaradina. Najpoznatije je kao lokacija spomenika posvećenog Bitki na Vezircu.
appMap.description_long_en:
Vezirac Hill sits at the foot of Fruška gora, between Sremski Karlovci and Petrovaradin. It is best known as the location of the memorial to the Battle of Petrovaradin. A great war raged between the Habsburg Monarchy of Austria and the Ottoman Empire, and on August 5, 1716. Prince Eugene of Savoy led the Austrian army against the Ottoman army, which was led by the Grand Vizier Damat Ali Pasha, in one of the war’s determining battles.

The Grand Vizier set up his headquarters on Vezirac Hill, hence the name. This was the first major victory of the Habsburg Monarchy, which is truly spectacular due to the fact that only around 83,000 Austrian soldiers faced the Ottoman Army, a force 120.000 soldiers strong. The Habsburg empire kept Petrovaradin and the strategically ideal Petrovaradin Fortress, which was still under construction then, and the Ottoman army retreated to Belgrade. The Grand Vizier Damat Ali Pasha died in this battle, and was buried in the Belgrade Fortress on Kalemegdan. A monument commemorating the Battle of Petrovaradin was raised on Vezirac in 1902.

Today, Vezirac is not only the location of this monument, but also of several holiday homes belonging to the Petrovaradin municipality.
appMap.description_long_rs:
Brdo Vezirac se nalazi pri podnožju Fruške gore, između Sremskih Karlovaca i Petrovaradina. Najpoznatije je kao lokacija spomenika posvećenog Bitki na Vezircu. Na dan 5. avgusta 1716. princ Eugen Savojski je poveo austrijsku vojsku protiv turske vojske predvođene velikim vezirom Damadom Ali Pašom u odlučujućoj bitki Austrijsko-turskog rata. 

Veliki vezir je na ovom brdu postavio svoj štab, te je po njemu dobilo ime. Ovo je bila prva velika pobeda austrijske vojske, što je dodatno impresivno kada se uzme u obzir da je oko 83.000 austrijskih vojnika izašlo u susret turskoj vojsci, jakoj sili sa oko 120.000. Austrijsko carstvo je zadržalo Petrovaradin i stratešku poziciju Petrovaradinske tvrđave, koja je tada još uvek bila u izgradnji, a turska vojska se povukla u Beograd. Veliki vezir Damad Ali Paša je stradao u ovoj bitki i sahranjen je u Beogradskoj tvrđavi na Kalemegdanu. Spomenik u sećanje na ovu bitku podignut je na Vezircu 1902. godine.

Danas se na Vezircu pored spomenika nalazi i vikend-naselje koje pripada opštini Petrovaradin.

appMap.description_en: Sharp and pointed rocks below were made by sedimentation bellow earth, which at one time surfaced.
appMap.description_rs: Oštre i šiljate stene nastale sedimentacijom ispod zemlje koje su u jednom trenutku izbile na površinu.
appMap.description_long_en:
The two hundred milion year old rocks speak of the rich geological past of Fruška Gora. The sharp and pointed rocks are not characteristic of Fruška Gora, which is mostly characterised by forests, valleys, and rounded peaks.

They were made by sedimentation bellow eart, and then at one point they surfaces and since then they defy erosion. The period when the Orlovac rocks are especially beautiful is during winter, well after leaves fall. They’re located on a hill, on a slope, and they stand out from the environment thanks to their specific form.

You can get to Orlovac from the Crveni Čot, by walking next to the military object and the road which leads next to the Osovlje picnic area.
appMap.description_long_rs:
Dvesta miliona godina stare stene govore o bogatoj geološkoj prošlosti Fruške gore. Oštre i šiljate stene nisu karakteristične za Frušku goru, koju odlikuju listopadne šume, doline i zaobljeni vrhovi. Nastale su sedimentacijom ispod zemlje i onda su u jednom trenutku izbile na površinu i od tad one prkose eroziji.

Period kada stene Orlovac posebno dolaze do izražaja je zima, odnosno kada opadne lišće. Nalaze se na proplanku, na strmini, i svojim specifičnim oblikom se izdvajaju od okruženja. 

Do Orlovca se može doći iz pravca Crvenog čota, prolaskom pored vojnog objekta i putem koji vodi pored odmarališta Osovlje.

appMap.description_en: According to legend, the first grape vines on Fruška Gora were planted in Šuljamačka Glavica, back in the Roman days.
appMap.description_rs: Prema legendi, prvi čokoti vinove loze na Fruškoj gori zasađeni su baš ovde na Šuljamačkoj glavici, za vreme carevanja Marka Aurelija Proba (276–278).
appMap.description_long_en:
According to legend, the first grape vines on Fruška Gora were planted in Šuljamačka Glavica, during the rule of the Roman emperor Marcus Aurelius Probus (276–278).

Šuljamačka Glavica is situated on the southern slopes of Fruška Gora, at the forest’s edge. At 150 m above sea level, sunlit during the entire day, it is the ideal location for vineyards. Other than vineyards, it is also used to grow fruit and grains.

The view of Srem flatlands is stunning from here, so it is no surprise that a lot of holidaymakers choose to build their holiday homes in the location. The pastoral harmony of vineyards, orchards, fields, forests and pastures is made complete with Istočnik source, which can be found on the road to Letenka.

You can reach Šuljamačka Glavica from Šuljam or from the marked forest trail starting in Letenka.
appMap.description_long_rs:
Prema legendi, prvi čokoti vinove loze na Fruškoj gori zasađeni su baš ovde na Šuljamačkoj glavici, za vreme carevanja Marka Aurelija Proba (276–278).

Nalazi se na južnim padinama Fruške gore, na samom obodu šume. Obasjana je ceo dan suncem, što sa nadmorskom visinom od 150 metara stvara pogodne uslove za uzgoj vinove loze. Osim vinogradima, ovaj potez je pokriven i voćnjacima i poljima raznovrsnih žitarica. 

Sa ovog mesta se pruža širok pogled na ravni Srem, pa nije iznenađenje što se ovde nalazi i veliki broj vikendica. Ceo potez odiše harmonijom između šume, vinograda, livada i voćnjaka. U neposrednoj blizini, na putu ka Letenci, nalazi se izvor Istočnik. 

Do Šuljamačke glavice možete doći putem iz Šuljma, ili markiranom stazom kroz šumu, iz pravca Letenke.

appMap.description_en: Lazin Vir is a place of pride for the Vrdnik locals. The deep forest shade, small waterfall, spring and picnic area make this place truly special.
appMap.description_rs: Lazin vir je mesto na koje su Vrdničani veoma ponosni. Duboka šumska hladovina, mali vodopad, izvor i izletište ovo mesto čine posebnim.
appMap.description_long_en:
Lazin Vir is a place of pride for the Vrdnik locals. The deep forest shade, small waterfall, spring and picnic area make this place truly special.

Lazin vir and the waterfall, which is about 4m tall, are located at the Morintovo stream, which is a tributary of the Veliki potok. You can get to Lazin vir by taking a light 20 min stroll from the center of Vrdnik. If you decided to go to a picnic at Lazin vir, the tables and benches will make your life easier.

If you want to take a 4 km walk, you can go further down the marked mountain road towards the Novo Hopovo monastery.
appMap.description_long_rs:
Lazin vir je mesto na koje su Vrdničani veoma ponosni. Duboka šumska hladovina, mali vodopad, izvor i izletište ovo mesto čine posebnim.

Lazin vir i vodopad visine oko četiri metra nalaze se na na potoku Morintovo, koji je pritoka Velikog potoka. Do Lazinog vira se stiže laganom šetnjom iz centra Vrdnika za oko 20 minuta. Ako ste se odlučili za izlet na Lazinom viru, klupe i stolovi će vam olakšati boravak u prirodi.

Ukoliko želite u šetnju od četiri kilometra, možete produžiti markiranom planinskom stazom ka manastiru Novo Hopovo.

appMap.description_en: The Stručica monument got its name from the part of the Rakovac region it’s located in. It is dedicated to the fallen fighters.
appMap.description_rs: Spomenik Stručica je dobio naziv po delu Rakovca na kome se nalazi. Posvećen je palim borcima na tom mestu 1942. od strane okupatora.
appMap.description_long_en:
The Stručica monument got its name from the part of the Rakovac region it’s located in. It is dedicated to the fallen fighters who died by the hand of the occupator in 1942. The most famous of which was national hero Stanko Paunović Veljko, as well as commandant Đorđe Marković Đilas and Zencel Hunjadi also called as Franja the Messenger.

The monument was built at the beginning of the 70s. The three columns that reach for the sky represent the three fallen soldiers. The author is Mirko Krstonošić. You can get to the monument from Stanko Paunović Veljko street, next to the famous Rakovac archeological site called Gradina.
appMap.description_long_rs:
Spomenik Stručica je dobio naziv po delu Rakovca na kome se nalazi. Posvećen je palim borcima na tom mestu 1942. od strane okupatora. Najpoznatiji među njima je narodni heroj Stanko Paunović Veljko, zatim komadant Đorđe Marković Đilas i Zencel Hunjadi zvani Kurir Franja.

Spomenik je izrađen početkom sedamdesetih. Tri izvijena stuba koja streme ka nebu predstavljaju tri poginula vojnika. Autor spomenika je Mirko Krstonošić. Do spomenika vodi Ulica Stanka Paunovića Veljka pored poznatog rakovačkog arheološkog nalazišta Gradina.

appMap.description_en: The spring is located near the Dubočaš stream, northwest from Vrdnik on the road towards Zmajevac.
appMap.description_rs: Izvor se nalazi u blizini potoka Dubočaš, severozapadno od Vrdnika, na putu ka Zmajevcu.
appMap.description_long_en:
The spring is located near the Dubočaš stream, northwest from Vrdnik on the road towards Zmajevac. From the right side of the Zmajevac-Vrdnik road, about 200m into the woods, there’s a marked Babin guz (Granny’s butt) spring, but it’s closed off behind metal doors.

Since the water drips from the rocks, the spring is fenced off and the water slowly fills the well. There’s the Dubočaš waterfall and spring nearby. In the forest by the spring is a cleaned up picnic area with benches and tables.
appMap.description_long_rs:
Izvor se nalazi u blizini potoka Dubočaš, severozapadno od Vrdnika, na putu ka Zmajevcu. Sa desne strane puta Zmajevac – Vrdnik, oko 200 metara kroz šumu, nailazi se na obeležen i metalnim vratima ograđen i zatvoren izvor Babin guz.

Pošto voda kaplje sa stena, izvor je ograđen i voda polako puni bunar. U blizini su potok i vodopad Dubočaš. U šumi pored izvora uređeno je izletište sa klupama i stolovima.

appMap.description_en: Across the Danube from the Strand, just by Sremska Kamenica, spreads the largest picnic area of Fruška Gora, and the largest park in Novi Sad.
appMap.description_rs: Naspram Štranda, sa druge strane Dunava i tik pored naselja Sremska Kamenica, prostire se Kamenički park, prva oaza prirode na putu za Frušku goru iz Novog Sad
appMap.description_long_en:
Across the Danube from the Strand, just by Sremska Kamenica, spreads the largest picnic area of Fruška Gora, and the largest park in Novi Sad. Most commonly used as a promenade, mountainbiking terrain, Kamenički Park is well-known as the setting of the largest local May Day festivities.

The original Kamenički Park was designed as the Marcibanji-Karačonji castle gardens, while the castle was still under construction, in 1758. Marcibanji-Karačonji castle was built in the classicist style and required a large green courtyard, modeled after English landscape gardens. The park included a promenade along the banks of the Danube, equestrian trails, five artificial lakes connected by a stream, wellsprings and rock benches, imported plants from all around the world, and several statues, of which the Five Heads, the Pompeiian Column, the Sphynx, and Amor and the Nymph still stand.

The wars and a series of new owners only added to the luxurious offers of Kamenički Park. A major of the American army and colonel in the Serbian army, John Frothingham, and his wife Jelena Lozanić, founded the House of Serbian-American Friendship.

Kamenički Park and the Marcibanji-Karačonji castle were declared public property following WWII, and the Marcibanji-Karačonji castle was announced a cultural monument in 1991.

There is a small hill-lookout in the center of the Park – The Hill of Roses, where you can also find five statues that resemble roman soldiers (though some say that the faces were modeled after members of the Karačonji family). Two of the oldest oak trees in Novi Sad can be found nearby – both planted in 1805. Only two lakes remain of the original five, both drawing water from the source, but the stream now runs all the way to the Danube river. The Danube promenade remains the most beautiful promenade in the Park, but it is used less often than the path that leads from the tunnels and forks into two smaller trails. One of these trails leads up to the Dečije Selo orphanage.
appMap.description_long_rs:
Park se danas najčešće koristi kao šetalište, teren za planinski biciklizam i kao lokacija najposećenijeg prvomajskog uranka svake godine.

Prvobitni oblik Kameničkog parka je nastao početkom izgradnje dvorca Marcibanji–Karačonji, 1758. godine. Dvorac je građen u klasicističkom stilu, sa idejom da se iza parka u blizini dvorca nađe velika zelena površina po uzoru na engleske pejzažne vrtove. U sklopu parka se nalazilo šetalište uz Dunav, jahačke staze, pet međusobno spojenih veštačkih jezera i potok, česme i kamene klupe, sadnice uvezene iz svih delova sveta, i nekoliko skulptura od kojih i dalje stoje Pet glava, Pompejski stub, Sfinga i Amor i Nimfa.

Menjanje vlasnika i ratovi samo su doprineli raskošnoj ponudi Kameničkog parka. Major američke vojske i pukovnik srpske vojske Džon Frotingem i njegova supruga Jelena Lozanić su 1919. godine ovde osnovali Dom srpsko-američkog prijateljstva.

Kamenički park i dvorac Marcibanji–Karačonji su nakon Drugog svetskog rata proglašeni društvenom svojinom, a dvorac Marcibanji–Karačonji je 1991. godine zaštićen kao kulturno dobro.

U sredini Kameničkog parka se nalazi brežuljak-vidikovac – Brežuljak ruža, gde stoji pet stubova nalik na pet rimskih vojnika (mada postoje teorije i da ta lica pripadaju članovima porodice Karačonji). U blizini se nalaze dva najstarija stabla hrasta u Novom Sadu – posađeni su 1805. godine. Od starih jezera ostalo je svega dva, koja se pune vodom iz izvora, ali potok i dalje teče do Dunava. Dunavska staza je najlepše šetalište u parku, ali se češće koristi staza koja polazi od tunela i račva se u dve manje staze, od kojih jedna vodi do Dečjeg sela.

appMap.description_en: The old limestone quarry Debeli cer is located near Andrevlje and today is a sightseeing point and eagle feeding ground.
appMap.description_rs: Stari kamenolom crvenog krečnjaka Debeli cer nalazi se u blizini Andrevlja i danas je vidikovac i hranilište za orlove.
appMap.description_long_en:
The old red limestone quarry Debeli cer is located near Andrevlje. This impressive place and the scar of Fruška Gora fromwhich rock was dug in the past is today visited only by nature lovers. The locals say that this rock was used to build the Vladikin dvor in Novi Sad. This place is also connected to stories about the Mammoth bone that’s displayed in the Zavičajni muzej in Čerević. The Beočin factory is the last to use the quarry, and a few years ago when it was recultivated, it was filled with earth and had grass planted.

You can get to the Debeli cer quarry by taking the road from Testera towards Andrevlje. Right near Andrevlje there’s a separate route to the quarry that you can take. It’s a light stroll through the woods (about 40 minutes). The road is walkable year-long, no matter the weather. The space is used in the winter by NP Fruška Gora as a feeding ground for eagles.
appMap.description_long_rs:
Stari kamenolom crvenog krečnjaka Debeli cer (Crveni majdan) nalazi se u blizini Andrevlja. Ovo impresivno mesto i ožiljak Fruške gore iz koga se nekada vadio kamen danas posećuju samo ljubitelji prirode. Meštani kažu da je od ovog kamena popločan Vladičanski dvor u Novom Sadu. Za ovo mesto se vežu i priče o Mamutovoj kosti koja je izložena u Zavičajnom muzeju u Čereviću. Beočinska fabrika je zadnja koristila kop, a pre nekoliko godina kada je rekultivisan nasuta je zemlja i posađena trava. 

Do kamenoloma Debeli cer može se stići putem od Testere prema Andrevlju. Neposredno pre Andrevlja postoji odvajanje za kamenolom do koga se stiže laganom šetnjom kroz šumu (40 minuta). Put je prohodan tokom cele godine bez obzira na vremenske uslove. Taj prostor zimi  NP Fruška gora koristi kao hranilište za orlove.

appMap.description_en: Plaža na Karašu je poznato kupalište na Dunavu. Spas od vrućine na tom mestu leti najčešće traže meštani Beočina.
appMap.description_rs: Plaža na Karašu je poznato kupalište na Dunavu. Spas od vrućine na tom mestu leti najčešće traže meštani Beočina.
appMap.description_long_en:
The beach at Karaš is a well known swimming spot at the Danube. The locals from Beočin usually find a quick escape from summer heat here. This sandy beach welcomes up to 1.000 swimmers. The view from the beach stretches onto the Beočin shore and the neighbouring Futog village.

You can get to Karaš by car, just take the Beočin bypass. The beach is clean, and has changing rooms, showers, a volleyball field in the sand… you’ll often find fishermen at this place, and if you don’t have the patience to go fishing, you can always treat yourself at the nearby restaurant.
appMap.description_long_rs:
Plaža na Karašu je poznato kupalište na Dunavu. Spas od vrućine na tom mestu leti najčešće traže meštani Beočina. Ova peščana plaža može da primi do 1.000 kupača. Pogled sa plaže se pruža na Beočinsku adu i komšijsko mesto Futog.

Do Karaša možete stići kolima, beočinskom obilaznicom. Plaža je uređena i poseduje svlačionice, tuševe, teren za odbojku na pesku… Neretki su i pecaroši na ovom mestu, a ako nemate strpljenja za pecanje, uvek se možete počastiti u obližnjem restoranu.

appMap.description_en: The Zjalina Spring is located in the Vrdnik settlment called Stara kolonija (Old Colony), where its also called Dobra voda (Good water).
appMap.description_rs: Izvor Zjalina se nalazi u vrdničkom naselju Stara Kolonija, gde ga još zovu i Dobra voda.
appMap.description_long_en:
The Zjalina Spring is located in the Vrdnik settlment called Stara kolonija (Old Colony), where its also called Dobra voda (Good water).

You can get to the Zjalina Spring from Vrdnik through the spa towards the Stara Kolonija village. With several fountains in this village, people still fill letres upon letres of fresh water, which comes from the large spring pool below. Stara Kolonija is the oldest, and was prevously a mining settlment, in Vrdnik.
appMap.description_long_rs:
Izvor Zjalina se nalazi u vrdničkom naselju Stara Kolonija, gde ga još zovu i Dobra voda.

Do izvora Zjalina se stiže iz Vrdnika putem kroz Banju ka naselju Stara Kolonija. Sa nekoliko česama u tom naselju, ljudi i dan-danas toče izvorsku vodu, koje u bazenu ispod izvora ima u izobilju. Stara kolonija je najstarije, nekada rudarsko naselje Vrdnika.

appMap.description_en: Bike Park Bukovac is a specialized terrain for mountainbiking and similar sports, situated on a beautiful lookout near Bukovac village, on the road to the old b
appMap.description_rs: Bike Park Bukovac je teren za planinski i ekstremni biciklizam na prelepom vidikovcu nadomak sela Bukovac, na putu prema staroj kasarni.
appMap.description_long_en:
Bike Park Bukovac is a specialized terrain for mountainbiking and similar sports, situated on a beautiful lookout near Bukovac village, on the road to the old barracks. It is the only specialized cycling terrain on Fruška Gora.

The Municipality of Sremski Karlovci donated 5,000 m2 of land near Bukovac to young cycling enthusiasts in 2014. A small group of enthusiasts transformed this terrain into a park for mountainbiking and BMX sports, with trails for cyclists of all skill levels, singlehandedly. Ever since the park opened, it has hosted many international cycling competitions and tournaments.

You can find the amazing crew that spends their time mostly during weekends. The park also has a relaxation zone, opening into a beautiful view of Novi Sad and Bačka.

Photo: Marko Milićev
appMap.description_long_rs:
Bike Park Bukovac je teren za planinski i ekstremni biciklizam koji se nalazi na prelepom vidikovcu nadomak sela Bukovac, na putu prema staroj kasarni. To je jedini specijalizovani teren za ovaj vid biciklizma na Fruškoj gori.

Opština Sremski Karlovci je 2014. godine donirala mladim ljubiteljima planinskog biciklizma 5.000 m2 zemlje iznad naselja Bukovac. Taj teren je pretvoren u park za planinski i ekstremni biciklizam (MTB i BMX), sa stazama za bicikliste svih nivoa sposobnosti. Od samog početka rada na ovom mestu se održavaju međunarodna takmičenja.

Super ekipu koja provodi vreme ovde uglavnom ćete naći vikendima. A u parku postoji i zona za odmor koju krasi prelepi pogled na Novi Sad i Bačku.

Foto: Marko Milićev

appMap.description_en: Ova impozantna tvrđava na obali Dunava je bogata istorijom kakvu može imati samo najznačajnija vojnologistička tačka regiona.
appMap.description_rs: Ova impozantna tvrđava na obali Dunava je bogata istorijom kakvu može imati samo najznačajnija vojnologistička tačka regiona.
appMap.description_long_en:
This imposing fortress hails from the 1st century B.C. when ancient Celts were still settling the Danube shoreline. Petrovaradin Fortress looms across the Danube from Novi Sad. This building has a long history as a military, trade, and scouting outpost for Celts, Romans, Byzantines, Franks, Ottomans, and Habsburgs, but today it is best known for its importance in the Habsburg-Ottoman war. The Fortress was annexed to the Ottoman Empire in 1526. and won back by the Habsburg Monarchy in 1691. The period between these two years was tense and full of conflict.

Although the foundations of the Petrovaradin Fortress were set back in the Bronze Age, it began resembling the fortress that it is today only at the end of the 17th century: the cornerstone of the Upper Fortress was set under the order of emperor Leopold I of the Habsburg Monarchy. Empress Maria Theresa granted independence to the Petrovaradin Fortress and the village that had formed at its feet in 1748. Habsburg constructions on the fortress were finally over in 1760.

The Petrovaradin Fortress constructions took a very long time, leaving a lot of room for myths and legends about its actual layout – particularly about the layout of its underground tunnels. It is known that they stretch four levels below ground. The first two levels have been mapped, and although the tunnels are, as a whole, still very dangerous and remote, you can book an organized tour and visit the uppermost, safest level.

The Petrovaradin Fortress was demilitarized sometime in the middle of the 20th century, and declared a historic monument. It is open to visitors today, and includes a well-maintained promenade, hotels, restaurants, ateliers and art galleries, a military barracks, the Novi Sad Academy of Arts, a planetarium and astronomical observatory, the most stunning panorama of Novi Sad, a Museum, and last but not least, the city Archive. One of the most famous landmarks of the Fortress is the Clocktower of St. Louis’ Bastion. This Clocktower is peculiar: since its main purpose is to tell time to ships passing by on the Danube, it’s small handle shows minutes, and the long handle shows hours – this is why it is affectionately known as the Drunk Clocktower.

The Fortress is home to a great number of cultural events each year, the best known by far being EXIT, a summer music festival.
appMap.description_long_rs:
Ovo impozantno utvrđenje vodi poreklo još iz doba I veka pre nove ere kada su stari Kelti naseljavali obale Dunava. Na desnoj obali reke, naspram Novog Sada, nalazi se Petrovaradinska tvrđava, zdanje koje je dugo služilo kao vojna, trgovačka i izviđačka ispostava Keltima, Rimljanima, Vizantijcima, Francima i Austrougarima, mada se njoj najčešće pripisuje važnost koju je imala u borbi protiv turske opsade. Godine 1526. je pripojena Turskom carstvu, a zatim 1691. vraćena Austrougarskom carstvu. Period između tih godina je bio napet i neizvestan.

Iako su temelji Petrovaradinske tvrđave postavljeni još u bronzano doba, ona je počela dobijati svoj oblik tek na samom kraju XVII veka, kada je pod naredbom cara Leopolda Prvog postavljen kamen-temeljac gornje tvrđave. Carica Marija Terezija je 1748. podarila nezavisnost Petrovaradinskoj tvrđavi i naselju koje se izgradilo oko nje. Austrougarski radovi na tvrđavi su zvanično okončani 1760. godine.

Dug period izgradnje je ostavio prostora mnogim mitovima i legendama o stvarnom rasporedu Petrovaradinske tvrđave – naročito o njenim podzemnim tunelima, za koje se zna da se prostiru na četiri nivoa ispod zemlje. Prva dva nivoa su mapirana, i iako je i dalje celokupna struktura tunela opasna i neistražena, moguće je otići u organizovanu turu po gornjem, najbezbednijem nivou.

Petrovaradinska tvrđava je demilitarizovana sredinom XX veka i proglašena istorijskim spomenikom. Danas se tamo nalazi uređeno šetalište, mnoštvo hotela, restorana, umetničkih ateljea i galerija, vojna kasarna, novosadska Akademija umetnosti, planetarijum i astronomska opservatorija, neprevaziđena panorama Novog Sada, kao i Muzej i Arhiv grada. Jedna od najpoznatijih znamenitosti tvrđave je sat-kula Bastiona Svetog Luja. Pošto je osnovna funkcija ovog sata da pokazuje vreme brodovima na Dunavu, mala kazaljka pokazuje minute, a velika sate, čime je sat zaradio ime Pijani sat. Veliki broj kulturnih manifestacija se odvija na Petrovaradinskoj tvrđavi svake godine, a najposećeniji je letnji muzički festival EXIT.

appMap.description_en: This spring is located near the Bike Park Bukovac. Before you get to the park, there’s a point where the road separates.
appMap.description_rs: Ovaj izvor se nalazi nedaleko od Bike Parka Bukovac. Pre neko što se popnete do parka, postoji odvajanje i betonski put koji vas vodi jednim delom.
appMap.description_long_en:
This spring is located near the Bike Park Bukovac. Before you get to the park, there’s a point where the road separates; take the concrete road, it’ll direct you towards the stream. Down the meadow in the grove you’ll fin the sweet respite in this wild garden. You can get to the spring from the village by taking the Gornja Baranja street, then walking through the meadow to the spring.

If you’re visiting the Bike Park, definitely do not miss ths spring.
appMap.description_long_rs:
Ovaj izvor se nalazi nedaleko od Bike Parka Bukovac. Pre neko što se popnete do parka, postoji odvajanje i betonski put koji vas vodi jednim delom. Dalje niz livadu u šumarku očekuje vas okrepljenje u ovom malom divljem vrtu. Do izvora se može doći i iz sela ulicom Gornja Baranja, pa dalje do izvora livadom, peške.

Ukoliko posećujete Bike Park, nikako ne propustite šetnju do izvora.

appMap.description_en: The Church of Our Lady of Snows at Tekije is the largest Marian church in Serbia, located on the Novi Sad-Belgrade highway, at the very exit from Petrovaradin.
appMap.description_rs: Na magistralnom putu Novi Sad – Beograd, po samom izlasku iz Petrovaradina, nalazi se najveće marijansko svetilište u Srbiji, Crkva Snežne Gospe na Tekijama.
appMap.description_long_en:
The Church of Our Lady of Snows at Tekije is the largest Marian church in Serbia, located on the Novi Sad-Belgrade highway, at the very exit from Petrovaradin. This Roman-Catholic church has an interesting history, one where it is hard to separate truth from legend. In its place was once a medieval sanctuary devoted to the Virgin Mary, but it was demolished by the Ottomans in the 16th century, and replaced with a small mosque and tekke (a roadside resting place). The mosque was repurposed as a small church again upon the signing of the Treaty of Karlowitz and retraction of the Ottomans in 1699.

After 17 peaceful years, a new war arose between the Habsburg Monarchy and the Ottoman Empire. On August 5, 1716, a decisive battle takes place on Vezirac Hill, where the Church is located – Prince Eugene of Savoy leads the Habsburg troops against the far more numerous Ottoman army, led by the Great Vizier Damat Ali Pasha. This is when the facts become blurry, but the legend is a beautiful one: snow falls on this warm summer day, and the Habsburg army interprets the sign as divine intervention from the Virgin Mary. Encouraged, they win the battle despite the unlikely odds. Henceforth, the church is dedicated to Our Lady of the Snows, also known as the Lady of Tekije.

The Church currently bears both a cross and a crescent, to symbolize the two religions that had sanctuaries in this spot.
appMap.description_long_rs:
Na magistralnom putu Novi Sad – Beograd, po samom izlasku iz Petrovaradina, nalazi se najveće marijansko svetilište u Srbiji, Crkva Snežne Gospe na Tekijama. Ova rimokatolička crkva ima veoma interesantnu istoriju iz koje je teško razaznati šta je mit a šta stvarnost. Na njenom mestu se nekada nalazila srednjovekovna bogomolja posvećena Devici Mariji, koju su Turci srušili i u XVI veku izgradili na njenom mestu omanju džamiju i malu tekiju (mirno počivalište, na arapskom).

Po potpisivanju Karlovačkog mira i povlačenju Turaka 1699. godine, džamija je ponovo pretvorena u omanju crkvu. Nakon 17 godina mira, usledio je novi rat između Austrougarske i Turske. Dana 5. avgusta 1716. se na Vezircu odvija velika bitka – austrijska vojska pod komandom princa Eugena Savojskog je daleko nadjačana turskom vojskom, pod komandom velikog vezira Damada Ali Paše. U ovom momentu činjenice postaju mutne, ali legenda je lepa: tog letnjeg dana pada sneg koji austrijska vojska tumači kao znak Device Marije i, ohrabrena, čudesno pobeđuje bitku. Od tog dana, crkva je posvećena Snežnoj Gospi (ponekad poznatoj i kao Tekijska Gospa).

Crkva danas nosi kao simbole i polumesec i krst kako bi obeležili dve religije koje su na tom mestu imale svoja svetilišta.

appMap.description_en: A source in a valley, underneath Šuljamačka glavica, deep in the forest and toward Letenka.
appMap.description_rs: Izvor Istočnik se nalazi u dolini ispod Šuljamačke glavice, dublje u šumi prema Letenci.
appMap.description_long_en:
Istočnik source can be found in the valley underneath Šuljamačka glavica, deep in the forest toward Letenka. It is easy to find if you follow the Fruškogorski marathon trail, starting from either Letenka or Šuljamačka glavica.

The source is nested by a stream and surrounded by low growing shrubbery. The actual source is walled in by a little well with a metal roof, and you can draw water from it..

A willow tree grows near the source, providing a welcoming shade and an easy way to spot the source location.
appMap.description_long_rs:
Izvor Istočnik se nalazi u dolini ispod Šuljamačke glavice, dublje u šumi prema Letenci. Lako ga je naći ukoliko pratite stazu Fruškogorskog maratona, bilo da se krećete od Letenke ili od Šuljamačke glavice.

Smešten je uz potok i okružen niskim rastinjem. Na mestu gde izvire voda ozidan je mali bunar sa metalnim krovom iz koga se zahvata voda. Duboku hladovinu na ovom mestu pravi i vrba po kojoj možete prepoznati ovaj izvor.

appMap.description_en: Pavlasov čot stands at 531 m above sea level. It was named after Ignjat Pavlas, the founder of one of the first mountaineering societies in Vojvodina.
appMap.description_rs: Jedan od tri najviša vrha na Fruškoj gori, na nadmorskoj visini od 531 m. Ime je dobio po Ignjatu Pavlasu, osnivaču prvog planinarskog društva u Vojvodini.
appMap.description_long_en:
Pavlasov čot stands at 531 m above sea level, making it one of the three highest peaks (čots) of Fruška gora. It was named after Ignjat Pavlas, the founder of one of the first mountaineering societies in Vojvodina.

Most mountaineering routes and meeting points cover Pavlasov čot. Thereby, it is marked with a small, pyramid-shaped monument in honor of Ignjat Pavlas, and located in the sparse forest near the trail. Each January, sometime around the memorial for the victims of the Novi Sad raid, a memorial for Pavlas is held, where mountaineers take a hike through Fruška gora, toward Pavlasov čot.

Pavlasov čot is located near the more famous Crveni čot, and can be reached by simply walking down from Partizanski road.
appMap.description_long_rs:
Ovo je jedan od tri najviša vrha (čota) na Fruškoj gori, koji se nalazi na nadmorskoj visini od 531 metra. Ime je dobio po Ignjatu Pavlasu, osnivaču prvog planinarskog društva u Vojvodini.

Česta je tačka u planinarskim rutama i mesto okupljanja planinara. Stoga je označen malim spomenikom u obliku piramide, podignutom u pitomoj šumi nedaleko od staze, koji odaje počast čoveku čije ime nosi. Svakog januara, u vreme održavanja pomena žrtvama racije u Novom Sadu, organizuje se Pavlasov memorijal, koji uključuje šetnju po Fruškoj gori do čota.

Nalazi se u blizini poznatijeg Crvenog čota, potrebno je samo spustiti se sa Partizanskog puta.

appMap.description_en: The Vrdnik stairs are a mysterious staircase made up of 58 big concrete steps that lead from the road into the forest, to the plateau where there’s nothing.
appMap.description_rs: Vrdničke misteriozne stepenice čini 58 velikih betonskih stepenika koji vode od puta, dalje u šumu, sve do platoa na kojem nema ničega.
appMap.description_long_en:
The Vrdnik stairs are a mysterious staircase made up of 58 big concrete steps that lead from the road deeper into the forest, all the way to the plateau where there’s nothing. 

The purpose of the staircase and the plateau isn’t known, but it seems like it was planned to be a memorial or a place for rest.

They’re located at the exit from Vrdnik to Zmajevac, just by the road, and they’re an ideal place to be inspired and imagine your own fairy tail, myth, or legend.
appMap.description_long_rs:
Vrdničke misteriozne stepenice čini 58 betonskih stepenika koji vode od puta, dalje u šumu, sve do platoa na kojem nema ničega. Od platoa se dalje ne nastavlja staza u šumu.

Namena stepenika i platoa nam nije poznata, čini se da je u planu bilo spomen-obeležje ili mesto za odmor.

Nalaze se na izlazu iz Vrdnika prema Zmajevcu, neposredno pored puta i predstavljaju pravo mesto da osmislite svoju bajku, mit ili legendu.

appMap.description_en: A small monument bearing the name „Janko T” is situated on the road from Andrevlje to the Debeli cer quarry.
appMap.description_rs: Na putu koji vodi od Andrevlja prema kamenolomu Debeli cer, primetićete mali spomenik sa natpisom Janko T.
appMap.description_long_en:
A small monument bearing the name “Janko T” is situated on the road from Andrevlje to the Debeli cer quarry.

The monument was built in memory of Janko Tufegdžić, who was killed in this spot on April 28, 1932. Janko was poaching when he was spotted by Ivan Braški, the head forester. Ivan Braški acted according to standard legal procedures, stopping Janko and ordering him to peacefully surrender his weapon, as he’s been caught poaching. Janko, however, drew his gun and shot the head forester. Ivan Braški was able to return fire and shoot the poacher in the arm. Enraged, Janko attempted to strangle Ivan, who drew his knife in self-defense and fatally injured Janko.

Following this ruthless event, a monument was raised for Janko, as a memorial and a reminder to all poachers. Ivan Braški recovered, but never completely – from then on, he could only perform lighter ranging duties.

The monument was restored in the mid ‘90s thanks to the hunter Stevan Kasić.
appMap.description_long_rs:
Na putu koji vodi od Andrevlja prema kamenolomu Debeli cer, primetićete mali spomenik sa natpisom Janko T.

Podignut Janku Tufegdžiću, nastradalom na tom mestu 28. aprila 1932. godine. Janka je tog dana nadlugar Ivan Braški primetio u šumi i krivolovu. Poštujući zakonsku proceduru, Ivan Braški je zaustavio Janka i naredio mu da mirno preda oružje, jer je uhvaćen u krivolovu. Janko je, međutim, potegao oružje i iz puške ranio lugara. Ivan Braški je uspeo da uzvrati vatru i rani krivolovca u ruku. Razljućen što je ranjen, Janko se vratio i krenuo golim rukama da davi lugara Braškog, koji je u odbrani uspeo da izvadi nož i nanese smrtne povrede Janku.

Nakon ovog nemilog događaja Janku su podigli spomenik u znak sećanja i kao opomenu svim krivolovcima. Ivan Braški se oporavio, ali ostao je sposoban samo za vršenje lake službe.

Spomenik je obnovljen sredinom 1990-ih, zalaganjem lovca Stevana Kasića.

appMap.description_en: The favourite picnic area of the locals from Divoš and the surrounding villages, from which there is a beautiful view of the Srem plain.
appMap.description_rs: Omiljeno je izletište meštana Divoša i okolnih sela odakle se pruža lep pogled na sremsku ravnicu. Nedaleko odavde nalaze se manastiri Kuveždin i Đipša.
appMap.description_long_en:
Rohalj bases were named after the underground bases, that were the hideout of the local population that withdrew from Divoš, Ležimir and the surrounding villages during the Second World War. The shelters were placed on the then possession of the Divoš family Rohalj, hence the first part of the name. At this place were stationed partisan detachments hidden in the gorges, so during the war this site was a free territory. Immediately beside the road there is a memorial house, built in 1972, in which the NOB exhibits were exhibited.

Today it is abandoned and most of the exhibits are transferred to the Museum of Srem, in Sremska Mitrovica. Not far from the memorial house, in the direction of the paved road, there is a memorial cemetery dedicated to the victims of the war.

This location is a favourite picnic area for locals from Divoš and other surrounding villages, and especially are popular overnight stays in the surrounding forest during the May holidays. There are a number of mountain resorts nearby. Only a few kilometers from here are monasteries Kuveždin and Đipša, and from the slopes there is a beautiful view of the village of Divoš and the Srem Plain. On a clear day in the distance, the mountains Cer and Majevica are clearly visible.
appMap.description_long_rs:
Rohalj baze su dobile naziv po podzemnim bazama, odnosno skrovištima lokalnog stanovništva koje se povlačilo iz Divoša, Ležimira i okolnih sela za vreme Drugog svetskog rata. Skloništa su bila smeštena na tadašnjem posedu divoške porodice Rohalj, pa otuda prvi deo naziva. Na ovom mestu su bili stacionirani partizanski odredi sakriveni u zemunicama, tako da je tokom rata ova lokacija bila slobodna teritorija. Odmah pokraj puta se nalazi spomen-kuća, podignuta 1972, u kojoj su bili izloženi eksponati NOB-a. 

Danas je napuštena i veći deo eksponata je prenet u Muzej Srema u Sremskoj Mitrovici. Nedaleko od spomen-kuće, u pravcu stazice popločane kaldrmom, nalazi se spomen-groblje posvećeno žrtvama u ratu.

Ova lokacija je omiljeno izletište meštana iz Divoša i drugih okolnih sela, a naročito su popularna noćenja u okolnoj šumi za vreme prvomajskih praznika. U blizini se nalazi veći broj planinskih izvora. Na svega nekoliko kilometara se nalaze manastiri Kuveždin i Đipša, a sa padina se pruža lep pogled na selo Divoš i sremsku ravnicu. Po vedrom danu u daljini se jasno vide planine Cer i Majevica.

appMap.description_en: The sulphur spring is located in a forest about 200 meters from the Staro Hopovo Monastery, when you go through the forest.
appMap.description_rs: Sumporni izvor je smešten u šumi na nekih 200 metara od manastira Staro Hopovo, kada se krene putem kroz šumu.
appMap.description_long_en:
The sulphur spring is located in a forest about 200 meters from the Staro Hopovo Monastery, when you go through the forest. Water has a strong sulfur smell and is not recommended for drinking.

Near, only 40 meters away, there is the Staro Hopovo spring, which water is said to be healing. When you cross the small bridge over the stream Jelenac, you will see a stone chapel that protects nature lovers from bad weather.
appMap.description_long_rs:
Sumporni izvor je smešten u šumi na nekih 200 metara od manastira Staro Hopovo, kada se krene putem kroz šumu. Voda ima jak sumporni miris i ne preporučuje se za piće.

U blizini, na samo 40 metara od njega, nalazi se izvor Staro Hopovo, za čiju vodu kažu da je lekovita. Kada pređete „mostić” preko potoka Jelenac, ugledaćete kapelicu od kamena koja ljubitelje prirode štiti od vremenskih neprilika.

appMap.description_en: Vidrakovac spring is located in a forest about 1 km away from the Staro Hopovo monastery, when you take the forest road.
appMap.description_rs: Izvor Vidrakovac je smešten u šumi na nekih 1 kilometar od manastira Staro Hopovo, kada krenete šumskim putem.
appMap.description_long_en:
Vidrakovac spring is located in a forest about 1 km away from the Staro Hopovo monastery, when you take the forest road. The water is cold and good for drinking.

Close by, at some meters 800 meters towards the monastery, there are the Staro Hopovo spring, which as it's said has healing waters, and when you cross the bridge over the Jelenac stream, you come to the Sulphur spring, whose water has a strong sulphur smell and it is not recommended for drinking.
appMap.description_long_rs:
Izvor Vidrakovac je smešten u šumi, na nekih 1 kilometar od manastira Staro Hopovo, kada krenete šumskim putem. Voda je hladna i dobra za piće.

U njegovoj blizini, na nekih metara 800 metara kada se krene prema manastiru, nalaze se izvor Staro Hopovo, za čiju vodu kažu da je lekovita, a kada pređete „mostić” preko potoka Jelenac, dolazite do Sumpornog izvora, čija voda ima jak sumporni miris i ne preporučuje se za piće.

appMap.description_en: Babina Česma spring is located in the forest, about 2 kilometres from the Bešenovo lake and Bešenovo monastery, when you take the car road.
appMap.description_rs: Izvor Babina česma je smešten u šumi i udaljen je nekih 2 kilometra od Bešenovačkog jezera i manastira Bešenovo, kada krenete drumom.
appMap.description_long_en:
Babina Česma spring is located in the forest, about 2 kilometres from the Beli kamen lake and Bešenovo monastery, when you take the car road.

If you are hiking,  at this spring you can make a break and refresh yourself, because a bench is set up and the water is for a drinking.
appMap.description_long_rs:
Izvor Babina česma je smešten u šumi i udaljen je nekih 2 kilometra od Jezera Beli kamen i manastira Bešenovo, kada krenete drumom.

Ako ste u šetnji, kod ovog izvora možete napraviti predah i osvežiti se, jer je postavljena klupa i voda je za piće.

appMap.description_en: The setting of the museum leads all visitors to the journey through the historical and cultural heritage of this village.
appMap.description_rs: Postavka muzeja sve posetioce vodi na putovanje kroz istorijsku i kulturnu baštinu ovog sela i upoznavanje sa njegovim znamenitim žiteljima.
appMap.description_long_en:
Homeland Museum of Čerević was founded in 1980. The setting of the museum leads all visitors to the journey through the historical and cultural heritage of this village and familiarisation with its famous inhabitants, who have confirmed their attachment to this place by their life voyage or by their creative opus.

Exhibits that you can see here are: artwork, sculptures, manuscripts, photographs and other materials, they are classified into special units. The handwritten legacy of the poet Jovan Grčić Milenko and the legacy of the sculptor Jovan Soldatović are presented separately.

A comprehensive setting within the museum represents the development of Čerević in time. At the same time, it presents some of Čerević's prominent personalities based on the preserved older sources, as well as the personality and events of the interwar period and during the national liberation fight.

With this setting, a collection of fossil fauna and archaeological excavations from the Čerević locality are exposed as special smaller whole. 

On the history of Čerević and the life path of many of his locals and celebrities, there are also lists of exhibited newsletters and periodicals, letters and other testimonies. They all contain an authentic story related to the existence of Čerević through time, to the diverse events and actions of many individuals.
appMap.description_long_rs:
Zavičajni muzej Čerevića osnovan je 1980. godine. Postavka muzeja sve posetioce vodi na putovanje kroz istorijsku i kulturnu baštinu ovog sela i upoznavanje sa njegovim znamenitim žiteljima, koji su svojim životnim putem ili svojim stvaralačkim opusom potvrdili vezanost za ovo mesto.

Eksponate koje ovde možete videti su: umetnička platna, skulpture, rukopisi, fotografije kao i druga građa, razvrstani su u posebne celine. Odvojeno je predstavljena rukopisna zaostavština pesnika Jovana Grčića Milenka i legat vajara Jovana Soldatovića. 

Sveobuhvatna postavka u okviru muzeja predstavlja razvoj Čerevića kroz vreme. Istovremeno prezentuje neke od istaknutijih ličnosti Čerevića na osnovu očuvanih starijih izvora, kao i ličnosti i zbivanja međuratnog perioda i tokom NOR-a. 

Uz ovu postavku izložena je, kao posebna omanja celina, zbirka fosilne faune i arheološke iskopine sa lokaliteta Čerević. 

O istoriji Čerevića i životnom putu mnogih njegovih meštana i znamenitih ličnosti, govore i listovi izloženih glasila i periodika, pisama i drugih svedočanstava. Svi oni sadrže neku autentičnu priču vezanu za postojanje Čerevića kroz vreme, za raznolika zbivanja i delovanje mnogih ličnosti.

appMap.description_en: When you take Partizan road towards Vizić, at the intersection Vizić-Divoš there are concrete barricades as a legacy from the NATO bombing.
appMap.description_rs: Kada krenete Partizanskim putem ka Viziću, na samoj raskrsnici Vizić-Divoš naići ćete na betonske barikade koje su zaostavština od NATO bombardovanja.
appMap.description_long_en:
When you take Partizan road towards Vizić, at the intersection Vizić-Divoš you’ll came across concrete barricades as a legacy from the NATO bombing. Sometimes these gray blocks remind us of some not so beautiful times and with their appearance they damaged the natural environment in which they are.

In order to change their purpose and breathe new life, Fruškać team and friends gathered around the platform, in June 2015, joint efforts to made creative intervention and with little goodwill and paint turned them into watermelons slices. ?

The former not so beautiful association became the symbol of this part of Fruška Gora, which now bring smiles to the passer-by faces, motivates them to stop for a moment, take the picture and make us think wheter the famous watermelons have always been here.
appMap.description_long_rs:
Kada krenete Partizanskim putem ka Viziću, na samoj raskrsnici Vizić-Divoš naići ćete na betonske barikade koje su zaostavština od NATO bombardovanja. Nekada su nas ove sive gromade podsećale na neka ne tako lepa vremena i svojim izgledom narušavale prirodni ambijent u kome se nalaze.

Kako bi im promenuli namenu i udahnuli novi život, ekipa Fruškaća sa prijateljima okupljenim oko platforme, u junu 2015. godine je zajedničkim snagama napravila kreativnu intervenciju i uz malo dobre volje i boja pretvorila ih u kriške lubenice. ?

Nekadašnja ne tako lepa asocijacija, postala je simbol ovog dela Fruške gore, koji prolaznicima sada mami osmehe, motiviše ih da na trenutak zastanu, opale koju fotku i natera na razmišljanje da li su famozne lubenice oduvek bile ovde.

appMap.description_en: "Benišek-Veselinović" winery is located in one of the oldest houses in Sremski Karlovci. Tastings are held in its large cellar.
appMap.description_rs: Vinarija Benišek-Veselinović se nalazi u jednoj od najstarijih kuća u Sremskim Karlovcima. Ispod cele kuće nalazi se podrum u kojem se održavaju degustacije.
appMap.description_long_en:
The "Benišek-Veselinović" winery occupies one of the oldest houses in Sremski Karlovci. The cellar spreads underneath the entire house, and it is that that wine and rakija tastings are held. Tastings can be scheduled in advance for groups of up to 25 people.

The offer centers on local products such as wine, rakija, homemade juice and jams, cheese, and proja (corn bread cake). Visitors can schedule a complete traditional lunch to go with their wine tasting. The food is entirely homemade - partly by the friendly hosts themselves, and partly bought off of local rural manufacturers.

The winery can also be booked for smaller occasions for up to 30 people. Accommodations are available throughout July and August - 8 rooms with up to 2 beds. The "Benišek-Veselinović" winery is open from 10 AM to 6 PM on workdays and weekends. It can be reached by a paved road, and visitors can use 5 parking spots.

Includes: Wi-Fi, parking area.
appMap.description_long_rs:
Vinarija Benišek-Veselinović se nalazi u jednoj od najstarijih kuća u Sremskim Karlovcima. Ispod cele kuće nalazi se podrum u kojem se održavaju degustacije i koji služi za odlaganje vina i rakije. Degustacije se zakazuju unapred za grupu do 25 osoba.

Ponuda se zasniva na degustacijama domaćih prozivoda, kao što su: vino, rakija, sokovi, pekmez, sir i proja. Postoji mogućnost organizovanja degustacija sa kompletnim tradicionalnim ručkom. Hrana je domaća. Deo namirnica domaćini sami proizvode, a drugi deo otkupljuju od seoskih proizvođača.

Ova vinarija takođe nudi mogućnost organizovanja manjih događaja, kapaciteta do 30 ljudi. U toku letnje sezone (jul i avgust) u ponudi je i smeštaj hostelskog tipa, čiji je kapacitet 8 soba sa po 2 ležaja. Radno vreme vinarije je od 10-18 h i radnim danima i vikendom. Do vinarije se dolazi asfaltnim putem i postoji 5 parking mesta.

Objekat poseduje: parking, WiFi

appMap.description_en: Don't miss out on this charming riding school in Čerević.
appMap.description_rs: Ne propustite da uživate u jahanju u maloj školi jahanja u Čereviću. Ljubazna instruktorka Jovanka, priuštiće vam nezaboravne trenutke kroz jahanje.
appMap.description_long_en:
Don't miss out on this charming riding school in Čerević. The kind and accommodating riding instructor Jovanka will make sure you have a great time, whether you are there to ride horses, or just to spend time with them. Here you can also take photos with the horses, learn how to care for them, hire them for filming, or take horseback riding lessons for children and adults, lessons in caring for horses.

"Čerević" riding school was formed first and foremost in order to cultivate love for horses and equestrian sports, and to allow people to enjoy the company of these magnificent creatures.
appMap.description_long_rs:
Ne propustite da uživate u jahanju u maloj školi jahanja u Čereviću. Ljubazna i strpljiva instruktorka jahanja Jovanka, priuštiće vam nezaboravne trenutke kroz jahanje i direktni kontakt sa konjima. Svim ljubiteljima konja ova škola nudi uslugu druženja sa konjima, časove jahanja za decu i odrasle, časove nege i brige o konjima, fotografisanje sa konjima, iznajmljivanje konja za snimanja.

Cilj ove škole jeste prvenstveno razvijanje ljubavi prema konjima i druženje sa ovim plemenitim životinjama.

appMap.description_en: A winery in an attractive setting, authentically Vojvodinian style. Offers wine, rakija and food tasting to organized tours.
appMap.description_rs: Vinarija u atraktivnom objektu napravljenom u autentičnom vojvođanskom stilu, nudi organizovanim grupama degustacije vina, rakije i proizvoda sa salaša.
appMap.description_long_en:
"Gaston Wine" winery sits cozily on the Danube coast, 43 km away from Novi Sad. Here you can enjoy wine tastings, but also sample rakija and other homemade specialties. The winery, as well as tamburaši (tambouritza band) and a catering team, can be booked for a variety of celebrations and events. Visitors may schedule organized trips to the church and Sremska house in Neštin, as well as use the winery's 4-person boat to navigate the Danube. The winery accomodates up to 60 people indoors, and up to 100 people in the covered garden.

Accommodations in "Gaston Wine" comprise of 3 rooms for up to 8 people and 4 additional beds in the house. The price includes bed and breakfast, but other meals can be arranged upon request. The accommodations are exclusive to larger groups with reservations. The winery can be reached by a paved road, and a large parking lot is situated nearby.

Includes: Wi-Fi, parking area.
appMap.description_long_rs:
Vinarija Gaston Wine se nalazi na samoj obali Dunava na 43 km od Novog Sada. U ponudi su degustacije vina, rakije i proizvoda sa njihovog salaša. Vinarija nudi mogućnost organizovanja raznih proslava uz tamburaše, seminari, team building i druge vrste događaja sa kompletnom uslugom. Posetiocima je na raspolaganju i čamac za 4 osobe za plovidbu Dunavom, kao i organizovani obilazak Neština, crkve i Sremske kuće. Vinarija raspolaže sa zatvorenom salom kapaciteta do 60 osoba kao i otvorenom natkrivenom terasom koja može da ugosti do 100 ljudi.

Smeštajni kapacitet za spavanje je do 8 osoba u tri sobe, plus 4 kreveta u samoj kući. Noćenje je sa doručkom, a postoji i mogućnost dogovora za ostale obroke. Smeštaj je namenjem isključivo većim grupama uz obaveznu najavu. Prilaz vinariji je asfaltnim putem, a u neposrednoj blizini je i veliki parking.

Objekat poseduje: WiFi, Parking

appMap.description_en: A small family-owned winery founded in 2016. It is located in Neštin, in a lush, natural setting.
appMap.description_rs: Ova mala porodična vinarija koja je počela sa radom 2016 godine. Vinarija je smeštena u Neštinu, u veoma lepom i interesantnom prirodnom okruženju.
appMap.description_long_en:
"Тri međe i oblak" is a small family-owned winery founded in 2016. It is located in Neštin, in a lush, natural setting. This young winery was formed out of a unique and intense love for good wine. It is expertly built by hand, and consists of a family estate and a plot of land with a cellar that all are welcome to. This winery exudes a rustic charm, and can be experienced by scheduling a tasting for a tour of up to 20 people.

The wines of "Tri međe i oblak" are characteristic and fruity. The lovely surroundings and an idyllic view of the vineyards create the perfect setting to enjoy a glass of fine wine in the sunset. The winery can be reached by an unpaved road.
appMap.description_long_rs:
Vinarija Tri međe i oblak je mala porodična vinarija koja je počela sa radom 2016. godine. Vinarija je smeštena u Neštinu, u veoma lepom i interesantnom prirodnom okruženju. Ova mlada vinarija nastala je iz jedinstvene i snažne strasti i ljubavi prema dobrom vinu. Vinarija je građena ručno, zanatski i predstavlja porodično imanje, parče zemlje sa podrumom u koji su svi dobrodošli. Ova vinarija privlači posetioce svojim rustičnim šarmom, tako da je moguće zakazati termin za obilazak i degustaciju za grupu do 20 ljudi.

Vina su karakteristična zbog svog voćnog ukusa. Predivno okruženje, idilični pogled na vinograde i prirodu, kreiraće ambijent za uživanje u čaši besprekornog vina, uz nezaobilazni zalazak sunca. Do vinarije se dolazi letnjim putem koji nije asfaltiran.

appMap.description_en: Skip the city crowd in the countryside estate "Blanušin raj“. Enjoy the sights and sounds of Fruška Gora and the Danube.
appMap.description_rs: Ukoliko želite da pobegnete od gradske vreve, posetite domaćinstvo „Blanušin raj“ sa pogledom na Dunav i uživajte u mirisima i zvucima seoskog turizma.
appMap.description_long_en:
"Blanušin raj" is a country estate in one of the most charming villages on Fruška Gora, Banoštor. The estate consists of an apartment with a double bed, an outdoors swimming pool, and a large covered yard, barbeque grill included. Guests should announce their arrival ahead. The estate organizes celebrations for up to 50 people. The Danube is 300 m away, and the estate also includes camping grounds and bicycle storage.

Includes: Wi-Fi, parking area.
appMap.description_long_rs:
Seosko domaćinstvo „Blanušin raj“ nalazi se u jednom od najšarmantnijih sela Fruške gore, Banoštoru. Domaćinstvo na raspolaganju ima jedan apartman sa francuskim ležajem, bazen u dvorištu i veliku natkrivenu terasu sa roštiljem. Potrebno je da najavite svoj dolazak unapred. Organizovanje svih vrsta proslava do 50 osoba. Dunav je na 300 m udaljenosti, a imanje poseduje i prostor za kampovanje i parking biciklista.

Objekat poseduje: parking, WiFi

appMap.description_en: The fishing cottage "Jovanović" is located in Neštin, just by the Danube shore. Two objects make up this estate.
appMap.description_rs: Ribarski konak Jovanovići nalazi se u Neštinu, na samoj obali Dunava. Ovo poljoprivredno gazdinstvo čine dva objekta.
appMap.description_long_en:
The "Jovanović" estate is situated 43 km from Novi Sad, just by the Danube. This estate is comprised of two parts: the "Hemingway" apartment and the "Jovanović" fishing cottage. The apartment comes with 5 beds and a stunning view of the river. The fishing cottage sits in the lower part of the estate, and is mostly used for celebrations for up to 30 people. The hosts can organize catering for up to 30 people - stews are a specialty here, especially fish stew, but you can also order barbecues and roasts.

The estate is more than a bed and breakfast - guests can navigate the river to the Neštin's island and sand beaches, and Danube's meanders, or they can indulge in some quality fishing. The path leading up to the estate is unpaved.

Just by the estate is an abandoned boat hull, painted over by Vanja Vikalo and Sanja Stojkov, members of our community.

Includes: Parking area.
appMap.description_long_rs:
Ribarski konak Jovanović se nalazi na 43 km od Novog Sada, na samoj obali Dunava. Ovo domaćinstvo čine dve celine: zaseban apartman Hemingvej i Ribarski konak Jovanović. Apartman raspolaže sa 5 ležajeva i krasi ga prelep pogled na Dunav. Ribarski konak se nalazi u donjem delu objekta i služi za organizovanje proslava i događaja za do 30 ljudi. Domaćinstvo nudi uslugu organizovanja ishrane do 30 ljudi. Specijaliteti su riblje čorbe i paprikaši, a možete dogovoriti i jela sa roštilja i pečenje.

Osim smeštaja i ishrane, gosti imaju mogućnost da vodenim putem upoznaju neštinske ade, meandre, šporove i peščane plaže kao i da ribare. Put nije asfaltiran pa se do gazdinstva stiže letnjim putem.

Pored objekta se nalazi napuštena brodska olupina koju su oslikali članovi našeg udruženja Vanja Vikalo i Sanja Stojkov.

Objekat poseduje: parking.

appMap.description_en: Situated just by the river Danube, this restaurant is an idyllic escape from the summer heat.
appMap.description_rs: Nalazi se na samoj obali Dunava, na mestu gde se neprestano spušta lagani povetarac sa Fruške gore, zbog čega je leti pravo mesto za beg od vrućina.
appMap.description_long_en:
This restaurant/tavern is situated on the coast of the Danube and perpetually cooled down by a light breeze from Fruška Gora, making it the ideal escape from the summer heat. The tavern works during the entire week, and the kitchen works from 12 AM to 8 PM. The restaurant offers a wide range of local specialties and drinks. This includes river fish and barbecue.

Up to 50 people can enjoy themselves in this soothing setting. Guests may schedule celebrations, too. "Plavi Dunav" is graced with a very good location, easy access, and a large parking area. One of its biggest perks is that it adjacent to the Banoštor ferry.

Includes: Wi-Fi, parking area.
appMap.description_long_rs:
Nalazi se na samoj obali Dunava, na mestu gde se neprestano spušta lagani povetarac sa Fruške gore, zbog čega je leti pravo mesto za beg od vrućina. Čarda je otvorena tokom cele nedelje, a kuhinja radi od 12 - 20 h. Restoran u ponudi ima raznovrsan meni domaće kuhinje, kao i veliki izbor pića. Na meniju se nalaze specijaliteti od rečne ribe i jela sa roštilja.

U prijatnom ambijentu ove čarde može da uživa do 50 ljudi. Takođe postoji mogućnost organizovanja svih vrsta proslava. Čarda ima izuzetnu lokaciju, lak pristup, veliki parking, a prednost im daje i blizina skele.

Objekat poseduje: parking, WiFi

appMap.description_en: Situated on the road to Ledinci, just by the Danube, is the "Vila Milana" restaurant - a traditional Vojvodinian-style building only 8 km away from Novi Sad.
appMap.description_rs: Na putu Novi Sad – Ledinci, koji se pruža paralelno uz Dunav i gde Fruška gora silazi do same vode, nalazi se vila „Milana”.
appMap.description_long_en:
Situated on the road to Ledinci, just by the Danube, is the "Vila Milana" restaurant - a traditional Vojvodinian-style building only 8 km away from Novi Sad. It is surrounded by a lovely garden and features a stunning view of the mighty river, exuding tradition, commitment, and passion. The ambience is complete with a menu that features some authentic local dishes rarely found in other restaurants.

Feast your senses in the bon vivant style of Vojvodina: breakfast gibanica; the ultimate local snack of bread, lard, and peppers nasuvo pasta with potatoes, and turkey with mlinci pastry, topped off with the fine wines of Fruška Gora.

Includes: Wi-Fi, parking area.
appMap.description_long_rs:
Restoran „Vila Milana” izgrađen je u tradicionalnom vojvođanskom stilu, a nalazi se na samo 8 km od Novog Sada. Okružena zelenilom baštenskog bilja sa pogledom na moćnu reku, odiše tradicijom, posvećenošću i ljubavlju. Atmosferu upotpunjuje i kuhinja koja je bazirana na pravljenju jela koja se danas ređe nalaze na jelovnicima mnogih drugih restorana, a sama predstavljaju tradicionalnu trpezu Vojvodine.

Uživajte u pravom vojvođanskom užitku: gibanica kao predlog doručka, zatim „Leba, masti i paprike” (sinonim za vojvođansko jelo), nasuvo sa krompirom, ćuretina sa mlincima, sve zaliveno dobrim fruškogorskim vinom.

Objekat poseduje: parking, WiFi

appMap.description_en: The "Beli Čin" restaurant is situated on the road to the Beočin monastery. It is designed in an ethno style and decorated with vintage items.
appMap.description_rs: Restoran „Beli čin“ nalazi se na putu prema manastiru Beočin. Celokupan ambijent ovog restorana uređen je u etno stilu i ukrašen eksponatima
appMap.description_long_en:
The "Beli Čin" restaurant is situated on the road to the Beočin monastery. It is designed in an ethno style and decorated with artifacts from a time long past but fondly remembered.

Guests are welcomed with homemade slatko (very sweet fruit preserve). The meals are varied - local cuisine enhanced by our grandmothers' recipes. Some beloved dishes include food prepared under a sač (large metal cover), fresh fish and potages... Vegetarian and vegan food is also served, and the menu reaches its peak during the Orthodox fast. Guests can buy souvenirs and local products in the restaurant: homemade juice, jams, cheese, etc.

"Beli Čin" can accommodate up to 80 guests indoors, and just as many outdoors. It is available for organizing every manner of celebrations, presentations, and other events.

Includes: Wi-Fi, parking area for cars and buses.
appMap.description_long_rs:
Restoran „Beli čin“ nalazi se na putu prema manastiru Beočin. Celokupan ambijent ovog restorana uređen je u etno stilu i ukrašen eksponatima starih predmeta koji predstavljaju repliku nekog prošlog vremena.

Gostima za drobrodošlicu se služi slatko domaće proizvodnje. Hrana je raznovrsa, domaća kuhinja obogaćena bakinim receptima. Služe se jela ispod sača zatim sveža riba i čorbe...  U ponudi restorana su vegetarijanska i veganska jela. Meni je još bogatiji tokom pravoslavnog posta.  U restoranu možete kupiti suvenire i proizvode domaće radinosti: sokove, pekmeze, sirevi i sl.

Restoran može da primi 80 gostiju unutra i isto toliko u napolju. Ovde se mogu organizovati sve vrste proslava, prezentacija i drugih događaja. 

Objekat poseduje: parking (i za autobuse), WiFi

appMap.description_en: Ethno budžаk is located in Čerević, underneath Fruška Gora. It will entrance you with its unique ethno design and warm ambiance.
appMap.description_rs: Etno budžаk se nalazi u Čereviću, u podnožju Fruške gore. Uređen u etno stilu, svojim izgledom, toplom i domaćinskom atmosferom vas neće ostaviti ravnodušnim.
appMap.description_long_en:
The countryside estate "Ethno Budžak" is located 25 km from Novi Sad, at the foot of Fruška Gora. It will entrance you with its unique ethno design and warm ambiance. The estate has a separate apartment with its own bathroom and kitchen. It has 2 double bed rooms. There is no onsite catering.

This is a great spot for nature lovers, but also people keen on tradition and history. The yard is large, well-kept, and decorated with vintage tools for maintaining orchards and vineyards. Guests can organize activities in the yard.

Includes: Wi-Fi, TV, AC, parking area.
appMap.description_long_rs:
Seosko turističko domаćinstvo Etno budžаk nаlаzi se 25 km od Novog Sаdа, u podnožju Fruške gore. Svojim izgledom, toplom i domaćinskom atmosferom vas neće ostaviti ravnodušnim. Domaćinistvo poseduje zaseban apartman koji ima zasebno kupatilo i kuhinju. Raspolaže sa dve dvokrevetne sobe i od usluga pruža samo prenoćište. 

Ovo mesto predstavlja odličan prostor za ljubitelje prirode, tradicije i istorije. Dvorište je prostrаno, uređeno, sа velikim brojem predmetа koji su se nekаd koristili prilikom obrаde voćnjаkа i vinogrаdа. Mogućnost individualnih aktivnosti u velikom, prostranom dvorištu.
 
Objekat poseduje: WiFi, TV,  klima, parking.

appMap.description_en: This winery's first strains were planted at the foot of Fruška Gora, on "Belo Brdo" hill, hence its name.
appMap.description_rs: Prve loze ove vinarije zasađene su podno Fruške gorena brdu koje nosi naziv Belo brdo, odakle i potiče naziv vinarije.
appMap.description_long_en:
The "Belo Brdo" winery was founded in 2010. It is located 17 km from Novi Sad. The winery's first strains were planted at the foot of Fruška Gora, on "Belo Brdo" hill, hence its name.

The winery relies exclusively on its own grape production, and its capacities are at 120,000 litres of wine a year. Guests can schedule organized wine tasting tours here, and try vintages that have earned golden and silver medals across many competitions. The wine tasting hall is spacious, it fits up to 30 people. Upon request, the hosts will organize lunch for groups of up to 15 people as well.
appMap.description_long_rs:
Vinarija Belo brdo je osnovana 2010. godine i nalazi se na 17 km od Novog Sada. Vinarija je nazvana po mestu na kojem su zasađene njene prve loze - Belo brdo podno Fruške gore.

Vinarija se oslanja na sopstvenu proizvodnju grožđa - godišnji kapacitet je 120 000 litara vina. Vlasnici ove čerevićke vinarije raspoloženi su za prijem organizovanih grupa turista koji žele da probaju vrhunska vina okićena zlatnim i srebrnim medaljama sa različitih takmičenja. Degustaciona sala je prostrana i omogućava prijem grupa do 30 osoba. U dogovoru sa vlasnicima, moguće je organizovati i ručak za manje grupe do 15 osoba.

appMap.description_en: The family-owned winery Šijački is located 25 km from Novi Sad, on the coast of the Danube. The winery uses grapes from its own local vineyards.
appMap.description_rs: Porodična vinarija Šijački se nalazi na 25 km od Novog Sada i smeštena je na samoj obali Dunava. Vinarija poseduje sopstvene vinograde
appMap.description_long_en:
The family-owned winery Šijački is located 25 km from Novi Sad, on the coast of the Danube. The winery uses grapes from its own vineyards, spread across the northern part of Fruška Gora. It produces around 60,00 litres of wine a year.

Guests can schedule visits and wine tasting with snacks. The balcony fits up to 50 people. A conversation about the history of wine making with the hosts as you gaze across the expansive Danube is an experience for all the senses.

The winery is open from 8 AM to 5 PM. It is closed on Sunday.

Includes: Wi-Fi, parking area.
appMap.description_long_rs:
Porodična vinarija Šijački se  nalazi na 25 km od Novog Sada i smeštena je na samoj obali Dunava. Vinarija poseduje sopstvene vinograde rasprostranjene duž severnih obronaka Fruške gore. Godišnje proizvodi oko 60 000 litara vina. 

Uz dogovor sa domaćinima otvoreni su za turističke posete, organizaciju degustacija vina uz meze. Na terasi je moguće smestiti do 50 osoba. Razgovor sa domaćinima sa otvorenim pogledom na Dunav je iskustvo koje se dugo nosi u svim čulima. 

Radno vreme vinarije je 09:00-17:00. Nedelja je neradni dan. 

Objekat poseduje: parking, WiF

appMap.description_en: The house and dairy farm „Gorski” are located in the Fruška Gora village of of Jazak and they produce cheese according to the traditional recipe 100% goat milk.
appMap.description_rs: Domaćinstvo i mlekara „Gorski” nalaze se u fruškogorskom selu Jazak i proizvode sir po tradicionalnoj recepturi od 100% kozjeg mleka
appMap.description_long_en:
The household and dairy farm „Gorski” are located in the Fruška Gora village of Jazak, 45 minutes from Novi Sad and about an hour from Belgrade. The farm exists since 2008, when the owners bought the first goat. The top quality and taste that they achieved by making cheese for themselves wanted to share with others. Shortly thereafter the production of goat cheese „Gorski” begins.

Cheese is produced according to the traditional recipe of 100% goat milk. In their offer they have the following types: semi-hard, young, halumi with lavender, mature cheese in oak and mature cheese in olive oil.

There is a small tasting hall with a capacity of up to 20 people, where you can try and buy cheese. The room is suitable for organised visits, private meetings, business meetings. For more than five people it is necessary to announce the arrival in advance.
appMap.description_long_rs:
